statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.GoodsNo , AA.BrandID , AA.Age , AA.Gender , AA.Season , AA.Origin , AA.CategoryID , AA.UseYn , AA.AbroadYn
, BB.GoodsName
FROM dbo.LGGoods AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.LGGoodsDetail BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.GoodsID AND BB.LanguageCode = #LanguageCode# LEFT JOIN dbo.LMBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.GoodsNo LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR BB.GoodsName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
AND AA.GoodsNo = #GoodsNo#
AND BB.GoodsName LIKE '%'+#GoodsName#+'%'
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
AND AA.CategoryID = #CategoryID#
AND AA.Age = #Age#
AND AA.Gender = #Gender#
AND AA.Season = #Season#
AND AA.Origin = #Origin#
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND AA.AbroadYn = #AbroadYn#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.GoodsNo , AA.BrandID , AA.Age , AA.Gender , AA.Season , AA.Origin , AA.CategoryID , AA.UseYn , AA.AbroadYn
, BB.GoodsName , BB.Description
FROM dbo.LGGoods AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.LGGoodsDetail BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.GoodsID AND BB.LanguageCode = #LanguageCode# WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.LGGoods ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, GoodsNo, BrandID, Age, Gender, Season, Origin, CategoryID, UseYn, AbroadYn ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #GoodsNo#, #BrandID#, #Age#, #Gender#, #Season#, #Origin#, #CategoryID#, #UseYn#, #AbroadYn# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.LGGoods SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, GoodsNo = #GoodsNo# , BrandID = #BrandID# , Age = #Age# , Gender = #Gender# , Season = #Season# , Origin = #Origin# , CategoryID = #CategoryID# , UseYn = #UseYn# , AbroadYn = #AbroadYn# WHERE ID = #ID#
